text: Yad nɨbop nen wog anɨb ak gen, yɨp gɨ tɨmel gel yul dɨpin ak, takaw ma mɨdeb. Klays binɨb ne dɨnɨg, yul awl yɨbɨl ak dak. Yul awl dak ak pen, ma kul gak. Yul yad dɨpin ak, Klays anɨb ak tek yad yul dɨpin. Anɨb ak tek, yad Klays binɨb ne gɨñin agɨl, yul dɨpin. Klays binɨb ne okok, kɨli wak ñɨn kɨd tob kɨd ne okok tek mɨdebal. Anɨb ak yad mɨñmɨñ gɨl wog anɨb ak gɨpin.
